document.full_text: cuba published on monday economic reform guidelines approved by the ruling communist party that include proposals for the sale of homes and cars and possible changes to make it easier for cubans to travel abroad.
document.title: cuba publishes reform guidelines, but details short
lines_and_colors: cuba published on monday economic reform guidelines approved by the ruling communist party that include proposals for the sale of homes and cars and possible changes to make it easier for cubans to travel abroad.
